item.title: Guggenheim says this little-known cancer stock can more than double from here
item.description: Guggenheim applauded CC Oncology's immunotherapy development and "potentially attractive catalyst path."

item.title: Morgan Stanley highlights stocks that could see big earnings surprises this quarter
item.description: Morgan Stanley highlighted companies such as Roblox and Reddit that could surprise investors to the upside as third quarter earnings are reported.

item.title: A bubble may be forming, but there are still good investment opportunities in this market, says Josh Brown
item.description: Some AI stocks are vastly overvalued, suggesting there's a bubble, but that shouldn't deter pouring new money into good projects, Josh Brown told CNBC...

item.title: Goldman Sachs portfolio manager Brook Dane lists Nvidia, TSMC among top AI stocks to buy
item.description: Although Nvidia is trading at all-time highs, Goldman Sachs' Brook Dane said the stock doesn't look "extended."

item.title: Shares of Chili's owner Brinker are rising on a JPMorgan upgrade. Here's why the bank thinks the stock is cheap
item.description: The bank upgraded the stock to overweight from neutral.
